txt.en:
Severing Strike, Sudden Strikes, Ravage, and Devastating Strike gain the ability to tier up the Reckless Melee effect, which greatly increases your damage, but also increases your incoming damage.

Severing Strike will always tier up Reckless Melee.
Sudden Strikes, Ravage, and Devastating Strike have a small chance to tier up Reckless Melee for each swing of your blades.
